blocks.name: fvmptrab
blocks.content: Value of a function mapping a set to a class abstraction restricting a class depending on the argument of the function. More general version of ~ fvmptrabfv , but relying on the fact that out-of-domain arguments evaluate to the empty set, which relies on set.mm's particular encoding. (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, c2, w0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s0, c4, w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c4, c2))
  -| wi(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wi(wnel(c1, c3), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, c2, w0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  fvmptd(s1, c0, c1, crab(s0, c2, w0), c3, crab(s0, c4, w1), universe, wcel(c1, c3))
  a1i(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c3, crab(s0, c4, w1))))
  adantl(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(crab(s0, c4, w1), crab(s0, c2, w0)))
  rabeqbidv(s0, c4, c2, wceq(cv(s1), c1), w1, w0)
  id(wcel(c1, c3))
  rabexd(s0, crab(s0, c2, w0), c2, universe, wcel(c1, c3), w0)
  eqid(crab(s0, c2, w0))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, c2, w0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, c3)))
  fvmptndm(s1, c1, c3, c0, crab(s0, c4, w1))
  sylbir(wn(wcel(c1, c3)), wceq(emptycls, crab(s0, c2, w0)), wnel(c1, c3))
  df-nel(c1, c3)
  syl(wnel(c1, c3), wceq(emptycls, crab(s0, c2, w0)), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  syl6req(emptycls, crab(s0, c2, w0), crab(s0, emptycls, w0), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  rabeq(s0, c2, emptycls, w0)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptrab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }
  âŠ£ c0 =(s1 âˆˆ c3 â†¦ { s0 âˆˆ c4 | w1 })
  âŠ£ (s1 = c1 â†’(w1 â†” w0))
  âŠ£ (s1 = c1 â†’ c4 = c2)
  âŠ£ (c1 âˆˆ c3 â†’ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  âŠ£ (c1 âˆ‰ c3 â†’ c2 = âˆ…)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, c1 âˆˆ c3)
  fvmptd(s1, c0, c1, { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, c3, { s0 âˆˆ c4 | w1 }, universe, c1 âˆˆ c3)
  a1i(c1 âˆˆ c3, c0 =(s1 âˆˆ c3 â†¦ { s0 âˆˆ c4 | w1 }))
  adantl(c1 âˆˆ c3, s1 = c1, { s0 âˆˆ c4 | w1 } = { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 })
  rabeqbidv(s0, c4, c2, s1 = c1, w1, w0)
  id(c1 âˆˆ c3)
  rabexd(s0, { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, c2, universe, c1 âˆˆ c3, w0)
  eqid({ s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 })
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, emptycls, Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c3)
  fvmptndm(s1, c1, c3, c0, { s0 âˆˆ c4 | w1 })
  sylbir(Â¬ c1 âˆˆ c3, âˆ… = { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, c1 âˆ‰ c3)
  df-nel(c1, c3)
  syl(c1 âˆ‰ c3, âˆ… = { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, c2 = âˆ…)
  syl6req(emptycls, { s0 âˆˆ c2 | w0 }, { s0 âˆˆ âˆ… | w0 }, c2 = âˆ…)
  rabeq(s0, c2, emptycls, w0)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fvmptrabdm
blocks.content: Value of a function mapping a set to a class abstraction restricting the value of another function. See also ~ fvmptrabfv . (Suggested by BJ, 18-Feb-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptrabdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c4, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  mp2(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)), wi(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wo(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  pm2.1(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  sylbi(wi(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wi(wo(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0))), wo(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  imor(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  expcom(wo(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wo(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)))
  sylbir(wa(wo(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wo(wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)), wo(wa(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  ordir(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  jaoi(wa(wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2)))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c0, c1), crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cdm(c0))), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6req(emptycls, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0), crab(s0, emptycls, w0), wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))))
  rabeqdv(s0, cfv(c2, c3), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, cdm(c2))), w0)
  ndmfv(c3, c2)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  fvmptd3(s1, c0, c1, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0), c4, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  rabbidv(s0, cfv(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s1), c1), w1, w0)
  biimpi(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  eleq2i(c1, cdm(c0), c4)
  eqtr4i(cdm(c0), c4, crab(s1, c4, wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe)))
  dmmpt(s1, c0, c4, crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1))
  mprgbir(s1, c4, wceq(c4, crab(s1, c4, wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe))), wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe))
  rabid2(s1, c4, wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1), universe))
  rabex(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w1)
  a1i(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(crab(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0), universe))
  rabex(s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)
  fvex(c2, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmptrabdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }
  âŠ£ c0 =(s1 âˆˆ c4 â†¦ { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 })
  âŠ£ (s1 = c1 â†’(w1 â†” w0))
  âŠ£ (c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)â†’ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, d(s1, c0))
  mp2((c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, (c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)â†’ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)), (Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)))
  pm2.1(c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  sylbi((c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)â†’ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)), ((Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))â†’(c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }), (Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)))
  imor(c3 âˆˆ dom(c2), c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  expcom((Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)), (Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)), (c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 })
  sylbir(((Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))âˆ§(Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))), (c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, ((Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ§ Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2))âˆ¨ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)))
  ordir(Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2), c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  jaoi((Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0)âˆ§ Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2)), c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), (c0 ` c1)= { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 })
  sylan9eq((c0 ` c1), { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, emptycls, Â¬ c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2))
  ndmfv(c1, c0)
  syl6req(emptycls, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, { s0 âˆˆ âˆ… | w0 }, Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2))
  rabeqdv(s0, (c2 ` c3), emptycls, Â¬ c3 âˆˆ dom(c2), w0)
  ndmfv(c3, c2)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  fvmptd3(s1, c0, c1, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 }, c4, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 }, universe, c1 âˆˆ dom(c0))
  rabbidv(s0, (c2 ` c3), s1 = c1, w1, w0)
  biimpi(c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), c1 âˆˆ c4)
  eleq2i(c1, dom(c0), c4)
  eqtr4i(dom(c0), c4, { s1 âˆˆ c4 | { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ })
  dmmpt(s1, c0, c4, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 })
  mprgbir(s1, c4, c4 = { s1 âˆˆ c4 | { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ }, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  rabid2(s1, c4, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  a1i(s1 âˆˆ c4, { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w1 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  rabex(s0, (c2 ` c3), w1)
  a1i(c1 âˆˆ dom(c0), { s0 âˆˆ(c2 ` c3)| w0 } âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  rabex(s0, (c2 ` c3), w0)
  fvex(c2, c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, (c2 ` c3), w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
